title: Account Transfer
body: When is account transfers gonna be re added... its been like a month...

replies.body: The last update in [**HollyMonster's post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) mentions it would take at least 5 to 6 weeks to be fully fixed up, so they likely won't be back until early January. Make sure to check back in that post for updates.
